name: 郭宏源
objective:
介紹電子零組件之組成，特性以及其應用，使學生具有實用電路之分析模擬與設計應用之能力，內容涵蓋：1. 半導体物理，2. 基本主動元件 (二極体，雙極性電晶体，場效電晶体)，3. 放大器電路，4. 邏輯 (數位) 電路，5. 積体電路。
1.Semiconductor physics 2.Diode 3.Bipolar Junction transistor 4.Field-efferct 5.Operatonal amplifier 6.Digital logic circuit 7.Integrated circuit
schedule:
01.Signals and Amplifiers
02.Circuit Models for Amplifiers
03.Operational Amplifiers
04.The Ideal Op Amp
05.The Inverting/Noninverting Configuration
06.Difference Amplifiers
07.Integrators and Differentiators
08.Large-Signal Operation of Op Amps
09.Midterm Exam.
10.Semiconductors
11.Diodes
12.Modeling the Diode
13.MOS Field-Effect Transistors
14.Current–Voltage Characteristics
15.The MOSFET in Amplifier Design
16.MOSFET Amplifier Configurations
17.Biasing in MOS Amplifier Circuits
18.Final Exam.
scorePolicy:
平時: 30%
期中考: 35%
期末考: 35%
materials: Sedra & Smith, ”Microelectronic circuits”, OXFORD PRESS, SIXth Edition
